name: Boyfiends
description:
This game is based on a random prompt from the random BL prompt generator:

"a selfish genius and a polite hero complain about their neighbor's taste in music in a car"

I made this game within 24 hours, partially because I wanted to try out video creation. So if you're interested in the process that went into making this game, check out the video I linked to this page :D

-----------------------------------

Game length: 5-10 minutes

Endings: 6

Walkthrough: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1wcwUYbiGXqwHE3hwo72jnotNEr6w1eQY6QOR3c5aTx8/...

There is no way to save, but honestly you can spam your way through it in like 30 seconds, you'll be fine lol
